experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: PT. INDOMARCO PRISMATAMA
workDescription: Worked on an application using ASP.NET Core or ASP.NET MVC as the framework, C# as the programming language, MySQL as the database, and IIS as the server.
Worked on reporting features using Crystal Reports and Excel Worksheets.
Developed the front-end application using Kendo UI and DataTables to integrate with the ASP.NET framework.
Created API endpoints secured with Bearer tokens, utilized by other departments.

experiences.title: PHP Developer
experiences.subtitle: Pt. BISNIS TEKNOLOGI MANAJEMEN
workDescription: Worked on developing applications using the PHP-based Destoon Framework. Optimized data workflows, managed the database, and customized features according to user requirements.
Worked on the front-end using the Bootstrap framework to customize the design model across various platforms (Android and web).

experiences.title: Developer
experiences.subtitle: Pt. VISIONET DATA INTERNASIONAL
workDescription: Developed a C# program that converts XML format into a more flexible string format for further processing.
Developed a Java program that reads data processed from the EDC machine, validates it, and converts it into a proper string format that can be imported into a PostgreSQL database.
